title: How to tell if my apps on my device are made by a developer - Quora

response.answer_text: Easy. They were. All of them. Google is a developer, Apple is a developer. Heck, even I am a developer. Every app on your device was made by some developer. If you are looking for a certain developer, the best way to look for that would be searching the App Store for your device. That will give you the information that you need.
If one of your apps wasn’t made by a software developer ,then who could’ve built it?! Aliens?!
